text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q7

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q7-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q7-2Mild (Some reduction in interest or pleasure but no clear impairment in functioning) and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q7-3Mild (Some reduction in interest or pleasure but no clear impairment in functioning) and Occasional
    Q7-4Mild (Some reduction in interest or pleasure but no clear impairment in functioning) and Much of the time
    Q7-5Mild (Some reduction in interest or pleasure but no clear impairment in functioning) and Almost all the time
    Q7-6Moderate (Significant reduction in interest or pleasure or clear impairment in functioning) and Occasional
    Q7-7Moderate (Significant reduction in interest or pleasure or clear impairment in functioning) and Much of the time
    Q7-8Moderate (Significant reduction in interest or pleasure or clear impairment in functioning) and Almost all the time
    Q7-9Severe (Profound reduction in interest, pleasure, and functioning) and Occasional
    Q7-10Severe (Profound reduction in interest, pleasure, and functioning) and Much of the time
    Q7-11Severe (Profound reduction in interest, pleasure, and functioning) and almost all of the time
    Q7-12Very Severe (Unable to work; needs help performing self-care activities; unable to function without assistance) and Occasional
    Q7-13Very Severe (Unable to work; needs help performing self-care activities; unable to function withoutassistance) and Much off the time
    Q7-14Very Severe (Unable to work; needs help performing self-care activities; unable to function without assistance) and Almost all of the time
